text: [Music] range lands make up a large part of the western United States 85% of Wyoming is considered rangeland one use we frequently see on Range land is grazing by both domestic livestock and Wildlife this grazing provided by rangelands is critical for healthy animals but the health of the rangelands must also be considered when rangelands are grazed in a sustainable fashion rangeland plants are able to grow grow and reproduce soils are protected and the resource is conserved for the future improper grazing can lead to weat infestations and soil erosion leading to A reduced Forge base degraded rangelands can be rehabilitated but recovery may take years and inputs such as seaing or other treatments can be expensive because rangelands are so critical for Wyoming's livestock and Wildlife it's important that we use them in sustainable ways from the University of Wyoming extension I'm Barton Stan exploring the nature of [Music] Wyoming
